Law Enforcement Technology

Professional ANPR Features

Advanced ANPR technology designed specifically for law enforcement operations, providing the tools and intelligence needed for effective policing and investigation.

Stolen Vehicle Detection
Instantly identify stolen vehicles against national and regional databases with real-time alerts.
BOLO Notifications
Automated Be-On-the-Lookout alerts for vehicles of interest in ongoing investigations.
Evidence Collection
Capture high-resolution images and video evidence with timestamp and location data.
Database Integration
Seamless integration with law enforcement databases, DMV records, and criminal justice systems.
Real-time Tracking
Track vehicle movements across multiple checkpoints for investigation and surveillance.
Comprehensive Reporting
Generate detailed reports for court proceedings, investigations, and operational analysis.

Enforcement Solutions

Complete law enforcement ecosystem

From mobile patrol units to command centers, our ANPR solutions provide comprehensive support for modern law enforcement operations and investigations.

Patrol Operations

Mobile ANPR units for patrol vehicles enabling real-time vehicle identification and alerts.

  • Mobile ANPR cameras
  • Real-time database checks
  • Instant alerts
  • GPS location tracking
Learn more →

Fixed Surveillance

Strategic placement of fixed ANPR cameras for continuous monitoring and evidence collection.

  • Strategic positioning
  • 24/7 monitoring
  • Evidence capture
  • Multi-lane coverage
Learn more →

Investigation Support

Comprehensive tools for criminal investigations and forensic analysis.

  • Historical search
  • Pattern analysis
  • Timeline reconstruction
  • Court-ready reports
Learn more →

Command Centers

Centralized monitoring and control systems for coordinated law enforcement operations.

  • Real-time dashboards
  • Alert management
  • Multi-agency coordination
  • Operational analytics
Learn more →
